entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
